hudson.triggers.TimerTrigger.spec: # once a day on the 15th of Mar Jun Sep Dec - quarterly #H H 15 6,9,12,3 *

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
cd /var/www/html/eol_php_code/update_resources/connectors ### orig #php continent_checklists_2024.php _ '{"task":"show_continents_metadata"}' #php continent_checklists_2024.php jenkins '{"task":"major_deletion"}' #php continent_checklists_2024.php jenkins '{"task":"generate_continent_checklists"}'
php continent_checklists_2024.php _ '{"task":"generate_continent_checklists", "sought_continent":"South America"}' php fill_up_undefined_parents_real_GBIFChecklists.php _ '{"resource_id": "SC_southamerica", "source_dwca": "SC_southamerica", "resource": "fillup_missing_parents_GBIFChecklists"}'
php continent_checklists_2024.php _ '{"task":"generate_continent_checklists", "sought_continent":"North America"}' php fill_up_undefined_parents_real_GBIFChecklists.php _ '{"resource_id": "SC_northamerica", "source_dwca": "SC_northamerica", "resource": "fillup_missing_parents_GBIFChecklists"}'
php continent_checklists_2024.php _ '{"task":"generate_continent_checklists", "sought_continent":"Asia"}' php fill_up_undefined_parents_real_GBIFChecklists.php _ '{"resource_id": "SC_asia", "source_dwca": "SC_asia", "resource": "fillup_missing_parents_GBIFChecklists"}'
php continent_checklists_2024.php _ '{"task":"generate_continent_checklists", "sought_continent":"Africa"}' php fill_up_undefined_parents_real_GBIFChecklists.php _ '{"resource_id": "SC_africa", "source_dwca": "SC_africa", "resource": "fillup_missing_parents_GBIFChecklists"}'
php continent_checklists_2024.php _ '{"task":"generate_continent_checklists", "sought_continent":"Europe"}' php fill_up_undefined_parents_real_GBIFChecklists.php _ '{"resource_id": "SC_europe", "source_dwca": "SC_europe", "resource": "fillup_missing_parents_GBIFChecklists"}'
php continent_checklists_2024.php _ '{"task":"generate_continent_checklists", "sought_continent":"Oceania"}' php fill_up_undefined_parents_real_GBIFChecklists.php _ '{"resource_id": "SC_oceania", "source_dwca": "SC_oceania", "resource": "fillup_missing_parents_GBIFChecklists"}'
# not yet processed: Antarctica #php continent_checklists_2024.php _ '{"task":"generate_continent_checklists", "sought_continent":"Antarctica"}'
